summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 FORD RANGER. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE REPAIR FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V036000 (AIR BAGS) FOR THE FRONTAL DRIVER AIR BAG INFLATOR EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME. THE CONTACT RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTIFICATION IN FEBRUARY OF 2016. THE DEALER (BOZARD FORD LINCOLN, 540 OUTLET MALL BLVD, ST AUGUSTINE, FL, 32084) STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE FOR THE REPAIR. THE MANUFACTURER WAS ALSO CONTACTED AND CONFIRMED THAT THEY DID NOT HAVE THE PARTS AVAILABLE, AND WERE NOT REPAIRING THE RECALL AT THIS TIME. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
